results.angle_name: Trend + estética ‘cowboycore’/animal print con toque rosa

input_assets.product_description: Diseño: Cuentan con una parte superior de piel sintética con un pronunciado estampado de vaca en tonos blanco roto y marrón oscuro/negro. Detalles Adicionales: El forro y la plantilla son de cuero sintético rosa, lo que coincide con los tréboles y, a menudo, con los cordones adicionales que se venden por separado
input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Depict ONLY the exact product described in the provided data. Do NOT change the model/category. Do NOT add brand logos. Keep the product as the hero element.

prompts.prompt: Create a high-contrast ecommerce thumbnail (1:1) featuring ONLY a Samba OG style low-top sneaker with faux cowhide print upper (off-white base with dark brown/black cow spots), gum sole, and visible pink synthetic leather lining/insole accents. No brand logos. Product is the hero: one shoe in 3/4 side angle facing right, large and sharp, occupying ~70% of frame. Clean studio look with soft shadow and subtle reflection. Background: warm off-white to light beige gradient with a faint pink glow behind the heel to hint the pink lining. Add a minimal cowboycore vibe using abstract shapes only (no hats, no people): a thin lasso-like curved line in pale tan behind the shoe, very subtle. Lighting: crisp key light, high micro-contrast to show texture. Leave clear negative space top-left for headline and bottom corners for badges. Photorealistic, premium, modern fashion aesthetic.

style.badge: rounded sticker, solid color, high contrast
rounded sticker, slightly smaller than 'Envío gratis', high contrast

composition_rules.focus: Sneaker must be the largest and sharpest element; emphasize cow print texture, gum sole edge, and a peek of pink lining; no other objects competing for attention.
composition_rules.text_legibility: Maintain high contrast between text and background; keep overlays inside 10% safe margins; avoid placing text over detailed cow print areas; ensure headline readable at mobile size.

prompts.negative_prompt: Do not add any brand logos or stripes, no trademarks, no watermarks, no copyrighted characters, no people or recognizable faces, no extra products, no boxes, no busy patterns, no low resolution, no blur, no heavy grain, no extreme perspective distortion, no incorrect shoe type (no high-top, no boots), no color changes (must be cow print off-white + dark spots, gum sole, pink lining), no misleading claims, no price text.

prompts.prompt: Design a bold, TikTok/IG-style ecommerce thumbnail (1:1) with ONLY the described Samba OG cow print sneaker: faux cowhide upper (off-white with dark brown/black spots), gum sole, and visible pink lining/insole. No brand logos. Composition: two shoes arranged in a dynamic V shape (one side view, one slightly top-down showing pink lining), both large and sharp, filling ~75% of frame. Background: clean matte black with a soft pink neon halo behind the shoes for contrast. Add subtle abstract sparkles/dots (non-branded) in light pink near the headline area to suggest 'viral' energy. Lighting: high-contrast studio lighting with crisp edges and controlled highlights; show texture clearly. Leave top-center space for headline and bottom corners for badges. Photorealistic product shot, premium street-fashion vibe.

rounded sticker, slightly smaller than 'Envío gratis', high contrast

prompts.prompt: Create a high-conversion ecommerce square thumbnail (1080x1080) featuring ONLY the product: a Samba OG style low-top sneaker with off-white + dark brown/black cow-print upper, gum sole, and visible pink lining/insole at the collar. No brand logos. Studio product photography look, ultra-sharp, high contrast, crisp edges, realistic materials (synthetic leather + cow-print texture), subtle shadow under shoe. Composition: single shoe in 3/4 side view facing right, slightly angled to show gum sole and a hint of pink interior. Background: clean light-to-mid gray gradient with a soft vignette. Add subtle scarcity cues as graphic elements (non-text): a faint blurred “sold out” stamp shape in the far background, very low opacity, not readable as a watermark. Lighting: softbox key light + rim light to separate from background. Color grading: neutral with slight warmth to enhance gum sole and cow print.

prompts.prompt: Design a square ecommerce thumbnail (1080x1080) with a bold scarcity + resale angle. Use a dynamic composition: two shoes as a pair, one in front (3/4 view facing left) and the second behind (slightly blurred, smaller, angled) to suggest limited stock without adding other objects. Background: deep charcoal to black gradient with subtle spotlight behind the front shoe. Add minimal graphic elements: a thin red diagonal stripe in the background (abstract) to imply urgency. Ultra-sharp front shoe, realistic texture, clean shadow, premium lighting with rim highlights.

prompts.prompt: Create a clean, high-contrast square thumbnail (1080x1080) emphasizing a timed drop. results.angle_name: Diseño sensorial y ‘cute details’: pelo sintético + forro rosa + suela gum

input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Depict ONLY the exact product described in the provided data. Do NOT change the model/category. Do NOT add brand logos. Keep the product as the hero element.
input_assets.product_description: Samba OG Vaca Negro Blanco: sneaker low-top con upper de piel sintética tipo faux cowhide/pony-hair con estampado de vaca en blanco roto y marrón oscuro/negro; forro y plantilla rosa; suela gum. Sin logos/marcas visibles.

prompts.prompt: Create a high-conversion 1:1 ecommerce thumbnail featuring a single low-top sneaker matching the described Samba OG cow print variant: faux cowhide/pony-hair texture upper with off-white and dark brown/black cow spots, visible pink synthetic leather lining and pink insole, and a gum sole. No brand logos or marks. Product must be the largest and sharpest element. Scene: clean studio with soft neutral warm background (light beige) and subtle shadow. Angle: 3/4 hero view showing the fuzzy cow-print texture on the upper, a clear peek into the pink interior, and the gum outsole edge. Add a small secondary detail inset (macro circle) showing the fuzzy texture and pink lining seam, but keep the main shoe dominant. Lighting: crisp, high-contrast, specular highlights that emphasize texture without glare. Color grading: warm, IG-friendly, premium. Leave clear negative space for text overlays within safe margins.

style.badge: rounded sticker, solid color, high contrast
rounded sticker, slightly smaller than 'Envío gratis', high contrast

composition_rules.focus: Product occupies ~70% of frame; shoe is centered slightly right; texture and pink lining must be clearly visible; inset macro must not compete with hero shoe.
composition_rules.text_legibility: Maintain clean negative space behind headline; ensure badges sit on solid/low-detail areas; keep all text inside 10% safe margin; high contrast between text and background.

prompts.negative_prompt: Any brand logo/trefoil/three stripes, any readable brand text, watermark, QR code, copyrighted characters, recognizable faces or people, extra shoes/pairs, changing product colorway, changing sole color away from gum, removing pink lining/insole, adding laces in bright colors not described, busy background, low resolution, motion blur, heavy glare, overexposed highlights, clutter, illegible text, distorted shoe shape, AI artifacts, duplicate products, props that cover the shoe.

prompts.prompt: Design a clean, high-contrast 1080x1080 ecommerce thumbnail with the described cow-print low-top sneaker as the hero (largest, sharpest). Show a top-down diagonal composition: the shoe angled from bottom_left to top_right, with the opening facing camera to showcase the pink lining and pink insole. Emphasize the fuzzy pony-hair texture with directional lighting and micro-contrast. Background: split-tone minimal backdrop—left side soft blush-pink gradient, right side warm cream—creating a cute/coquette vibe while keeping the product readable. Add a subtle gum-colored base shadow under the shoe to echo the outsole. Include a small minimalist texture callout line pointing to the upper (no extra text beyond overlays). No logos or branding.
